main event: A civilian reported observing a ribbon of light in the sky near Unity, Maryland on April 24, 1949, using binoculars.
interesting points: The object appeared to be a ribbon of light extending irregularly downward,The observer described seeing two parallel streaks of bright light within the ribbon,The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes and included a change in direction toward the east,The observer noted that the phenomenon was not consistent with known astronomical events or meteorological phenomena,The visual characteristics and behavior of the object were likened to a comet with two tails.
witness description: a member of the National Parks Association
